items.title: Here are the six new LEGO sets releasing in February 2026 + GWPs: Pokémon, Icons, Botanicals, more
items.summary:
A new month is upon us, and alongside all the latest LEGO news and reveals that we’ve seen over January, that also means we’re getting a fresh wave of brand-new LEGO building sets for February 2026. The previous month’s release coincided with the new year and gave us a massive list of 150 new sets to jump on, but we’re seeing far less dropping this month, with three hitting the market immediately and three others coming later – plus, there’s some GWPs to score, too, not to mention the current Double Insiders Points event running through February 2 that makes jumping on these and January’s releases all the better. Head below to get a rundown on what you can pick up as the clock has ticked over into a fresh new month.

items.title: Best of 9to5Toys – This week’s top deals: AirPods Pro 3, AirTag 2, monitors, watch bands, more

items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – your go-to spot for the notable deals and latest releases in PC gaming at a glance every Saturday morning. We just wrapped up yet anther packed week of deals, covering some seriously good offers on monitors and other gaming accessories like keyboards and mice, among other things. There were also a handful of wallet-friendly accessories and practical desk upgrades worth checking out. Woot came in strong with its video game sale, bringing notable deals on Razer and 8BitDo gear, while Logitech also made its new G Pro X2 Superstrike available to buy. This week’s roundup pulls all of that and more together, highlighting everything in one place.

more…

items.title: Electrified Weekly – Heybike Villain electric dirt bike launch, Lectric Valentine’s Day Sale, Aventon Level 2 e-bike at new $999 low, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. We’ve got an exciting jam-packed edition for you this week, led by the official launch deal for Heybike’s new Villain Electric Dirt Bike with $250 savings at $1,399. There’s also other events like Lectric’s Valentine’s Day e-bike Sale with up to $753 savings starting from $999, as well as a flash sale on Aventon’s Level 2 Commuter e-bike at a new $999 low, and much more. We also have some major power station events, with a standout being the exclusive $3,389 savings on the EcoFlow DELTA Pro Ultra home backup bundle with a Smart Home Panel 2 and FREE trolley at a new $4,409 low, as well as our latest hands-on review of Anker’s SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 Portable Power Station. All these and much more are waiting for you below.
